评论概述: Inconsistent fit with different colored sweats of same size?
评论详情: The first pair of sweats I ordered I loved! So i went to buy more in different colors. I got three more. Black, sky blue, and light camo; all size medium. Sky blue and light camo fit GREAT. comfortable, stretchy, and true to size. the black pair fit tightly with little stretch and fit more like a small than a medium. i never wear them. It’s frustrating because i want to get more (that fit well)! i have no idea if the next pair i buy will fit great like the sky blue and light camo, or like the black with terrible quality. i read another review stating the black ones fit differently than the others. hopefully that’s the only odd ball. willing to buy more colors but will return without hesitation this time, if they fit like the black pair.

评论概述: I Got a Pair with a Malfunction

The return process was easy, and I did think about reordering them, but they also weren't what I would consider "high-waisted", and I was really hoping for a pair of sweats that would go to my natural waistline, which these did not. Still, if you're just looking for comfy sweatpants, that sit on your hips, these might be for you. Provided, you get a pair that has the pockets sewn in correctly.

I recently purchased a pair of women's winter sweatpants that boasted of cosy comfort during the colder months. True to their description, these sweatpants were indeed comfortable. They featured a soft, plush interior that kept me warm and a relaxed fit that allowed flexibility for daily activities. However, the delight in their comfort was overshadowed by the disappointing quality. After just a few wears, signs of wear and tear began to show. The fabric pilled excessively, and the seams near the waistband started to unravel. Additionally, the color faded after the first wash, which was surprising and upsetting for a relatively new garment. While they score high on comfort, the compromised durability and poor fabric quality make them a less desirable choice for anyone looking for long-lasting winter apparel.
